effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.emerald: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: An attack that increases in power with friendship.
flavor_text.emerald: An attack that increases in power with friendship.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: This attack move grows more powerful the more the user likes its TRAINER.
